label: Identifier
comment: An identifier of a party, product, or facility that is defined by an identifier scheme and idenfier value and, optinally, verification evidence

datatypeProperties.comment: The value of the identifier within the scheme

The ISO-18975 conforming link resolver URL for this identifier. If not provided then the scheme owner should publish the ruleset for resolverURL construction from the identifierValue for the given schemeURI.
Link to evidence that attests to the validity and ownership of the identifer.

referencedBy.comment: Information regarding the specific production batch of the product.
A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the organization or company. (Link Resolver - GS1 company prefix?)
An array of identifiers representing a specific serialised item of the product.
An array of unique identifiers assigned to the product or model.
